HomeWiki:
Project Description
Open Source Home Control System.

.Net based with support for running in a Mono 1.2 environment (Synology)

Hardware Platforms

The aim is to support a number of low cost single computers such as Netdunio, BeagleBoard XM/BeagleBone and Raspberry PI as the central control unit.

Goals

To create an opensource home control system, that is flexible enough to run multiple protocols and lightweight enough to run on embedded devices.
